properties.markdownProperty:
This project seeks to develop a new version of REM, maintaining its philosophy of project management but extending its field of application to other professional sectors. The application will be developed from scratch in a different programming language and looking for a modernized aesthetic and greater flexibility when extending or adapting objects, documents and projects.
This new version is a meta-tool, where any professional can add or modify existing templates to adapt them to business needs. All this, combined with a user-friendly concept, means that the application could have a wider market than similar applications.
